name: suppose
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: suppose
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to think that something is likely to be true

example.eg: Dan didn't answer his phone, so I suppose (that) he's busy.
example.egtrans: 丹没有接我的电话，所以我想他应该很忙。

example.eg: He found it a lot more difficult to get a job than he supposed it would be.
example.egtrans: 他发现找工作比他想象的要难多了。

example.eg: Do you suppose (that) Gillian will marry him?
example.egtrans: 你认为吉莉恩会嫁给他吗?

example.eg: It is widely supposed (that) the CEO will be forced to resign.
example.egtrans: 很多人都猜测总裁会被迫辞职。

example.eg: We all supposed him to be German, but in fact he was Swiss.
example.egtrans: 我们都以为他是德国人，可事实上他是瑞士人。

example.eg: Her new book is supposed to be (= generally people think it is) very good.
example.egtrans: 很多人都认为她的新书写得非常好。

trans_examp.trans_en: used to show that you think something is true, although you wish that it were not
trans_examp.trans_cn: （用于表示与愿望相反的估计）猜，推测

example.eg: I suppose (that) all the tickets will be sold by now.
example.egtrans: 我想现在所有的票恐怕都已经卖完了。

example.eg: I suppose (that) you're going to be late again.
I suppose (that) you think that's funny. Well, I certainly don't.
example.egtrans: 我想你会认为这很有趣。但我一点儿也不这么认为。

trans_examp.trans_en: used to show unwillingness to agree

example.eg: "Can I go out tonight?" "Oh, I suppose so."
I don't agree with it, but I suppose (that) it's for the best.
example.egtrans: 我对此并不赞同，但我想这也是最好的办法了。

example.eg: I don't suppose (that) you could lend me £5 till tomorrow?
example.egtrans: 您能借给我5英镑，我明天还给您吗？

dsense.name: suppose
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: Investment of this kind supposes (= would not be possible without) an increase in the company's profits this year.
example.egtrans: 公司今年的利润要有增长才能进行这样的投资。

name: suppose
posTip: A word used to join parts of a phrase or sentence.

trans_examp.trans_en: used at the beginning of a sentence or clause to mean 'what would happen if'

example.eg: Suppose we miss the train - what will we do then?
example.egtrans: 假设我们错过了火车——那我们该怎么办?

example.eg: We'd love to come and see you on Saturday, supposing (= if) I don't have to work that day.
example.egtrans: 如果我星期六不用上班的话，我们会来看你。
